PERSONA:
###

meet darnell jackson, a 57-year-old african-american man living in the kansas city metropolitan area in the midwest. darnell was born in kansas city, missouri, and has spent most of his life in this region. he holds an associate's degree in automotive technology from metropolitan community college, which he obtained after completing some college credits at a local community college.

darnell works as an auto mechanic at a small, family-owned shop in the urban core of kansas city, earning around $28,000 per year. he has been in this role for about seven years, and despite the low pay, he takes pride in his work and is well-respected in the community for his expertise.

darnell lives with his long-term partner, latrice, in a modest, two-bedroom apartment in the brushes of the waldo neighborhood in kansas city. they have been together for over 15 years, and although they are not married, they consider each other their spouse. they do not have any children, but darnell has a 25-year-old son from a previous relationship who lives in the suburbs.

as an active member of the bethany tabernacle church of god in christ, darnell identifies as a born-again christian and protestant. however, he and latrice only attend church services on special occasions, citing busy schedules and personal preferences. despite infrequent attendance, darnell's faith plays a significant role in shaping his views on social justice and community service.

darnell is an avid internet user and checks his social media accounts and local news websites several times a day. he mostly uses his smartphone for browsing, email, and staying connected with friends and family.

regarding his economic situation, darnell is concerned about the high cost of living and stagnant wages in his field. he finds it challenging to make ends meet, especially with rising healthcare costs and household expenses. he worries about having to work multiple jobs just to get by. politically, darnell leans heavily towards progressive policies that address income inequality and had voted for democratic candidates in the last election.

in terms of free time, darnell loves to tinker with old cars, particularly classic chevys, which he considers a side hobby. when not working or taking care of personal matters, he likes to spend time listening to jazz music, especially local artists, and reading historical non-fiction novels about the civil rights movement.

this persona reflects a detailed, realistic representation of a specific individual fitting the given metadata.
